method: Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper, and grill over medium heat until fully cooked. Let cool and slice.
In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion.
Top with grilled chicken slices and sprinkle with feta cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
serve: Serve the grilled chicken salad immediately with your favorite bread or on its own.

method: Cook quinoa in water according to package instructions. Set aside.
In a large pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
Add bell pepper, zucchini, and broccoli to the pan. Stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Add cooked quinoa, soy sauce, and sesame oil to the vegetables. Stir to combine and heat through.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
serve: Serve the quinoa and vegetable stir-fry hot, garnished with sesame seeds if desired.

method: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and garlic, sauté until soft.
Add diced tomatoes and vegetable broth to the pot. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth.
Stir in fresh basil and season with salt and pepper.
If using, add heavy cream and heat through.
serve: Serve the tomato basil soup hot with a side of crusty bread.

method: Cut the pita pockets in half and spread hummus inside each pocket.
Fill each pita half with cucumber, tomato, red onion, shredded carrots, and crumbled feta cheese.
Drizzle tzatziki sauce over the vegetables.
serve: Serve the veggie pita sandwiches immediately with a side of fresh fruit or salad.

method: Spread mayonnaise and Dijon mustard evenly over each tortilla.
Layer turkey slices, avocado, lettuce, and cheddar cheese on each tortilla.
Roll up the tortillas tightly, securing with toothpicks if necessary.
Cut the wraps in half.
serve: Serve the turkey and avocado wraps with a side of fresh fruit or chips.
